work.title: Associate Software Developer
work.description: Creating Rest APIs and UI for payment simplifications. Sound Knowledge of React and Java ,Node js for Backend. Also have far as good debbuging skills. I was hired as a full stack developer by Nearex Technology, where I still work today. Since beginning my career there,I have been given the opportunity into Backend Payment API and then shifted to Frontend UI for the company. I am currently working towards my Certified Cloud certification while working as a full stack developer.
